articles.title: Health experts debunk myths on vaping: Does it really help smokers quit? What chemicals are you inhaling? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: E-cigarettes are banned in Singapore and getting caught vaping will get you a hefty fine, but that hasn’t stemmed the rising number of offence cases in recent years. CNA Lifestyle asks doctors and pharmacists all about vaping.
articles.content: The available data on the use of e-cigarettes as a means to quit cigarette smoking has been inconclusive, with some data showing some degree of improvement in quit rates, while other studies showed n… [+1530 chars]

articles.title: Tricia: Health of Perth Zoo’s beloved Asian elephant declines rapidly - PerthNow
articles.description: Perth Zoo’s beloved Asian elephant Tricia’s health is in rapid decline with vets confirming she is nearing the end.
articles.content:
Perth Zoos beloved Asian elephant Tricia is close to the end of her life after a recent rapid decline to her health.
Tricia, who is one of the oldest elephants cared for by a zoo in the world, has e… [+1371 chars]
